title.en: Prayer to Jamgön Kongtrul Lodrö Thayé1

text.en: You were guided by numerous great beings as your teachers,
text.en-trans: kyé chen yongdzin dumé jesu zung

text.en: And your knowledge of all the nonsectarian teachings of the Victorious Ones blossomed,
text.en-trans: rimé gyalten kün la khyenpa gyé

text.en: Supreme Vajra-holder of the threefold vows, lord of my buddha family—
text.en-trans: sumden dorjé dzin chok rik kyi dak

text.en: Lodrö Thayé, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: lodrö tayé zhab la solwa deb
